DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate clinical control program patient hypothyroidism pregnancy ( suggested resent guideline ) . Is possible monitoring patient every 4. week pregnancy keep thyroid function parameter within recommended range ? A retrospective study consecutive pregnant woman hypothyroidism follow outpatient clinic Endocrinology Unit , Herlev Hospital , Denmark 2012 . Patients select electronic medical system . Blood test The hormone level draw laboratory Clinical Biochemical Department , Herlev Hospital
DOC.brief_title: Monitoring Evaluation Levothyroxin Replacement Therapy Pregnant Women With Hypothyroidism
DOC.criteria: Consecutive pregnant woman LT4 treat hypothyroidism follow outpatient clinic Endocrinology Unit , Herlev Hospital , Denmark 2012
